description:
11.106 freezeframes
Freeze video frames.

This filter freezes video frames using frame from 2nd input.

The filter accepts the following options:

first.description: Set number of first frame from which to start freeze.

last.description: Set number of last frame from which to end freeze.

replace.description: Set number of frame from 2nd input which will be used instead of replaced frames.

name: freezeframes

parameters.description: Set number of first frame from which to start freeze.
parameters.name: first

parameters.description: Set number of last frame from which to end freeze.
parameters.name: last

parameters.description: Set number of frame from 2nd input which will be used instead of replaced frames.
parameters.name: replace

source:
11.106 freezeframes

Freeze video frames.

This filter freezes video frames using frame from 2nd input.

The filter accepts the following options:

first

Set number of first frame from which to start freeze.

last

Set number of last frame from which to end freeze.

replace

Set number of frame from 2nd input which will be used instead of replaced frames.
